item.description:
Host: Claire P. cell @ 603-247-0897
RAIN CANCELS THIS EVENT!   I can’t think of a better way to wrap up the biking season, than by riding and hiking the Rockingham Rail Trail to view the fall’s foliage!  Please know that my intent is to enjoy the view of the area, and to chat along the way.   This event is meant more to have fun than to get a workout but you will need to be able to bike and hike at a moderate level.

 Let’s allow about five hours for this event.   We will be riding the trail for a distance of about  10 miles one way, where we will be hiking a pretty steep hill to its top and eat our lunch and rest ourselves a bit while enjoying the beautiful view of our surroundings.  

!!!    This trail is NOT paved.   Mountain bikes or Hybrids are a must!   !!!

We will meet at 10:00 am at the Candia Rd parking lot in Manchester, NH.   Please follow these directions.   Take route 93 to Route 101 East, take Exit 1 take a right at the bottom, take second right around the traffic circle (Route 28), then enter the parking lot for the lake on your left.

 

Please remember to pack a lunch and bring your sunscreen, insect repellent and lots of fluids, and I recommend that you dress in layers for the best comfort for the day.

 

This event is at no cost! I hope to see you there!

Please RSVP or call my cell @ 603-247-0897
item.how_to_find_us: I will have a meetup sign

group.name: The Portsmouth "and beyond" Nite Out Meetup Group

item.name: Biking, hiking and lunch at the Rockingham Rail Trail (Manchester NH)
